Name: La cucina di Nonna Francesca
Review Text: This place advertises themselves as authentic Italian food, yet it fails miserably to meet the standards of what Italian cousins tastes like. It could probably fool Dutch palates but to a certain extent not forever. It's an Italian expats …

Name: La cucina di Nonna Francesca
Review Text: If you are wandering around the neighborhood, jump right in this place! The food tastes just like if you were in Italy! The personnel is very nice and prices are very good. Well done!

Name: La cucina di Nonna Francesca
Review Text: This "restaurant" advertises themselves in their shop window as "versgemaakte".. freshly made. So the last thing you expect is to be served pre made pizza. Yet that's exactly what we got. I even watched them pull it out of the wrapper and heat it up. Next time I want cardboard I'll get some from Albert Heijn, thanks

Name: La cucina di Nonna Francesca
Review Text: Going there to eat almost weekly as it's close to work. Really good food, good variety and fair prices. Wasn't disappointed so far.

Name: La cucina di Nonna Francesca
Review Text: Great Italian food and really nice staff! I live closeby so I will definitely be back :)

Name: La cucina di Nonna Francesca
Review Text: Delicious food and super friendly service! Def coming back.

Name: La cucina di Nonna Francesca
Review Text: Food is ok at a fair price. Limited seats though.

Name: La cucina di Nonna Francesca
Review Text: Good service, nice taste... good pricing.
